alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 20 at 4:58AM PST until February 23 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TUESDAY TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 1000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest California. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
